destinations.about: Imagine strolling on a pristine beach and relishing incredible seafood without a worry in the world! Does that sound like your dream vacation? Plan a holiday to a beach destination and enjoy adrenalin pumping sports activities with your loved ones.
destinations.heading: Beaches in India to Experience Leisurely Beach Life
destinations.subheading: Must Visit Beaches in the World for Your Next Trip to create magical moments by the shore. Watch the sunset on the beach and sway to the tunes of happening parties.

places.subtitle: Popular for Beaches & Nightlife
places.about: Get ready for an amazing beach vacation at Goa. You can expect very hot weather with very high humidity levels. You can also enjoy the various adventure activities in Goa.

places.subtitle: A Stunning Tropical Getaway
places.about: A delightful beach vacay awaits you at Maldives. You will love the beach activities and island hopping. Maldives is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.

places.subtitle: Tropical Band of Islands
places.about: Lakshadweep is a much loved beach destination. You can expect summer heat and the temperature rising upto 32°C. Lakshadweep is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Bewitching French City
places.about: If you are a beach lover, you must head to Puducherry. You can expect the city is at its hottest during this time. Puducherry is a hot favourite among foodies too.

places.subtitle: Tropical Beach Paradise
places.about: If you love beaches, then Bali is the place to go! You can expect frequent heavy rainfalls with high humidity levels. The local cuisines at Bali are worth trying out too.

places.subtitle: Scenic Coastal Town In Maharashtra
places.about: Alibagh is extremely popular for its beautiful beaches. You can expect hot And Humid Weather. The Temperature Tends To Go Very High. You can also unwind amidst the tranquil surroundings of Alibagh.

places.subtitle: Scenic Beach Town in Kerala
places.about: A delightful beach vacay awaits you at Kovalam. You will love water sports and beach activities. Kovalam is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Scenic Temple Town in Karnataka
places.about: Take your beach love to Gokarna. You can expect extremely hot and humid weather. Also, don’t miss the pilgrimage sites at Gokarna.

places.subtitle: A Tranquil Coastal Town in Kerala
places.about: Come and fall in love with the beach vibe of Varkala. You will love indulging in water sports, exploring the tourist attractions and attending the local festivals. Varkala is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Tropical Paradise in Thailand
places.about: Krabi is home to serene beaches. You will love the beaches and water sports. Krabi is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.

places.subtitle: Picturesque Tropical Getaway in the Andamans
places.about: A delightful beach vacay awaits you at Havelock. You can expect extremely hot days with temperat. Maldives is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.

destinations.about: Answer the call of the mountains with MakeMyTrip’s specially curated holiday ideas. Treat the nature lover in you to the serene bliss of lofty hills and explore hidden gems on an epic adventure.
destinations.heading: Hill Stations to Visit for a rejuvenating trip in Nature's Lap
destinations.subheading: Hill Stations - Breathe in the fresh mountain air, treat your eyes to the spectacular views and lose yourself in the charming ambience to feel refreshed from within.

places.subtitle: Mini Israel in Himachal Pradesh
places.about: Enjoy a memorable mountain vacation at Kasol. You will love trekking, camping, festivals and parties. Kasol is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Pretty Cantonment Town in Uttarakhand
places.about: Lansdowne is the perfect getaway for mountain lovers. You can expect intense cold weather with sub zero temperatures. Don’t forget to spend some time relaxing at Lansdowne.

places.subtitle: A Little Paradise in Himachal Pradesh
places.about: Prepare to be wooed by the mesmerizing mountains of Leh. You will love sightseeing and the surreal vistas of snow-capped mountains. Leh is also known for its unique wildlife.

places.subtitle: Hub of Natural Bounties and Winter Sports
places.about: Let the mighty mountains of Shimla raise your spirits! You will love sightseeing, paragliding, hiking, camping, and trekking. Shimla is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.

places.subtitle: Green Paradise in North-East Kerala
places.about: Enjoy a memorable mountain vacation at Wayanad. You can expect hot afternoons and pleasant evenings. You can also enjoy the various adventure activities at Wayanad.

places.subtitle: White Paradise in Ladakh
places.about: Prepare to be wooed by the mesmerizing mountains of Leh. You will love sightseeing and the surreal vistas of snow-capped mountains. Leh is also known for its unique wildlife.

places.subtitle: The Base Camp for Amarnath Yatra
places.about: For the best mountain views, head to Pahalgam. You will love soaking in lush green surroundings and exploring the various trekking trails. Pahalgam is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.

places.subtitle: Heaven in the White Hills of Kashmir
places.about: If mountains make you feel alive, then head to Gulmarg. You can expect the temperatures drop down to below freezing. Gulmarg is also very popular among relaxation-seekers

places.subtitle: A Serene Hill Station in Tamil Nadu
places.about: If crisp air and altitude feel like home, then the mountains of Coonoor are calling! You will love trekking and sightseeing. Coonoor is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.

destinations.about: Explore this list of heritage destinations and plan a holiday to visit historical monuments in UNESCO-identified heritage sites. Marvel at the stories and legacies of majestic dynasties while you walk through their historic lanes.
destinations.heading: Heritage Sites - Revisit History on a Vacation
destinations.subheading: Historical Places - Explore historical places & countless ideas for an epic break and make way to explore the prominent monuments, streets, architectures and UNESCO recognized sites

places.about: As the cradle of Indian culture and heritage for many centuries, Gwalior is a timeless treasure of art and music. The cityscape is adorned with historical monuments and a hilltop fort that are souvenirs of the dynasties that ruled here.
places.subtitle: The Land of Palaces

places.about: Revel in the rich art and heritage of Jodhpur. You will love desert camping and visiting the forts. Jodhpur also offers many culinary delights.
places.subtitle: A Hub of Royal Heritage

places.about: Literally translating to ‘the Lord of the Universe’, Bhubaneswar is an ancient city in Odisha that packs in many centuries of fascinating history. Also known as the Temple City of India, it is an educational and cultural hub as well.
places.subtitle: Odisha’s Capital City

places.about: Soak in the ancient tales and heritage of Udaipur. You will love exploring the beautiful palaces, temples, sun-kissed gardens and boat rides across the lakes. The local cuisines at Udaipur are worth trying out too.
places.subtitle: The city of lakes and palaces!

places.about: With well-preserved remnants of historic sites, Aurangabad is an ancient town about eight hours drive from Mumbai by road. It is known for its historical monuments, culturally rich museums and proximity to the renowned UNESCO World Heritage caves at Ajanta and Ellora.
places.subtitle: Explore Jaw Dropping World Heritage Sites

places.about: Thimphu will fascinate you with its rich heritage. You will love the lush valleys, blossoming flowers and lively festivals. Thimphu is also a popular wildlife destination.
places.subtitle: Scenic Mountain Destination in Bhutan

places.about: Soak in the ancient tales and heritage of Hanoi. You will love sightseeing, festivals and outdoor activities. The local cuisines at Hanoi are worth trying out too.
places.subtitle: Vietnam’s Culturally-Rich Capital City

places.about: Lucknow doles out a rich cultural experience. You will love sightseeing, shopping, and relishing the local dishes. Lucknow also offers many culinary delights
places.subtitle: Culturally Rich City in Uttar Pradesh

places.about: The ‘City of Palaces’, Mysore revels in its vibrant history, and rich arts and culture. It allures tourists with its grand palaces, majestic temples, and landscaped gardens.
places.subtitle: Scenic Royal City in Karnataka

destinations.about: Your honeymoon has to be the most memorable vacation of your life! Choose from a variety of pocket-friendly destinations from solitary beaches, picturesque hills, snow-clad mountains, relaxing yet exotic resorts to adventurous excursions.

places.subtitle: Romantic Island Getaway in Greece
places.about: Santorini is known for its stunning sunsets, white-washed buildings, and crystal-clear waters. It's the perfect destination for a romantic honeymoon with its charming streets and luxurious resorts.

places.subtitle: Tropical Paradise in French Polynesia
places.about: Bora Bora offers overwater bungalows, turquoise lagoons, and an incredible marine life experience. Ideal for couples looking to relax in a serene and picturesque environment.

places.subtitle: Scenic Hawaiian Island
places.about: Maui is famous for its breathtaking beaches, lush rainforests, and volcanic landscapes. Couples can enjoy a mix of adventure and relaxation in this beautiful island paradise.

places.subtitle: Enchanting City of Canals in Italy
places.about: Venice is the perfect destination for a romantic honeymoon with its historic architecture, gondola rides through the canals, and exquisite Italian cuisine.

places.subtitle: Luxury Overwater Villas
places.about: The Maldives offers luxurious overwater villas, pristine beaches, and crystal-clear waters. It's an ideal destination for couples seeking privacy and a touch of luxury.

places.subtitle: City of Love in France
places.about: Paris is synonymous with romance. Couples can explore iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, enjoy world-class dining, and stroll through charming neighborhoods.

places.subtitle: Exotic Beach Destination in Thailand
places.about: Phuket offers beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and a variety of activities like snorkeling and island hopping. It's a great mix of relaxation and adventure for honeymooners.

places.subtitle: Cultural Heart of Japan
places.about: Kyoto is known for its beautiful temples, traditional tea houses, and stunning gardens. Couples can immerse themselves in the rich culture and serene beauty of Japan.

places.subtitle: Winter Wonderland in Switzerland
places.about: The Swiss Alps offer stunning mountain scenery, luxurious chalets, and exciting winter sports. It's the perfect destination for couples looking for a cozy and adventurous honeymoon.

destinations.about: Recharge after a hectic week’s work with an idyllic trip over the weekend. Experience peace at a resort nestled in nature’s lap or feel your heart race with adventure sports. Go ahead, choose the perfect weekend hotspot from this list.

places.subtitle: Hill Station in Maharashtra
places.about: Lonavala is the perfect weekend getaway for city dwellers. You can expect hot and humid weather. Lonavala is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Eco-Sensitive Hill Station in Maharashtra
places.about: Matheran is the perfect weekend getaway for city dwellers. You can expect hot and humid weather. Matheran is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Hill Station in Maharashtra
places.about: Mahabaleshwar is the perfect weekend getaway for city dwellers. You can expect hot and humid weather. Mahabaleshwar is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Hill Station in Maharashtra
places.about: Panchgani is the perfect weekend getaway for city dwellers. You can expect hot and humid weather. Panchgani is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

places.subtitle: Scenic Coastal Town In Maharashtra
places.about: Alibagh is the perfect weekend getaway for city dwellers. You can expect hot and humid weather. Alibagh is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

destinations.about: Scroll through our list of romantic tourism destinations and plan a passionate getaway with your special someone to surreal valleys, snow-clad mountains, sun-soaked beaches or adventurous wildlife trails. Escape to a quieter location and rejuvenate in a romantic atmosphere.

Take a break from your busy routine and seek divine blessings at revered pilgrimages for some much needed peace. Whisper a wish or murmur a prayer of gratitude, and let your next trip be a truly memorable one!

Pamper your taste buds with flavours of different regions. Go on adventures to not just taste but also experience a truly authentic culinary journey. Explore the tiniest of lanes & largest of markets on your next food trail.

Explore adventurous destinations with exciting deals and challenging activities. Spike up your adrenaline and boost your confidence with thrilling treks, camping, water sports, scuba diving, rafting, bungee jumping, sky diving and many more off-beat activities.

Replace the boredom of your daily routine with an epic adventure. Be it soaring in the sky or diving in the sea, explore the best ideas for a thrilling trip. It's time to feel the adrenaline racing through your veins!

Escape the daily routine and humdrum of city life with a relaxing trip to a serene destination. Rejuvenate your body and mind with therapeutic spa treatments, soothing beach walks, flavourful drinks, scrumptious meals and morning meditations.

Want to learn more about new cultures and new countries? Then this is for the globetrotter in you! Make your next trip truly memorable with these specially curated ideas and feast your senses on jaw-dropping international landscapes and mouthwatering food.
